description: We want to hear from people in Yemen affected by the ongoing violence. Help us tell the story there.
title: Tell Us How the Crisis in Yemen Is Affecting You or Your Family
title_page: Tell Us How the Crisis in Yemen Is Affecting You or Your Family - The New York Times
text:
A Saudi-led campaign of airstrikes has pummeled Yemen for more than two months, exacerbating a humanitarian crisis there. Fighting between the coalition of Arab countries and the Houthi insurgent group, which is supported by Iran, has killed thousands and led to severe shortages of fuel and food. On Friday, an explosion destroyed a protected 2,500-year-old cultural heritage site in the capital, Sana.
We want to hear from people in Yemen affected by the continuing violence. Help us tell the story there. We may publish a selection of the responses.
